constructor-arg.value: SELECT e.id event_id, e.type, e.start_time, e.end_time, e.name, e.event_order, u.first_name, u.last_name, p.id presentation_id, p.name presentation_name FROM jland_site.event e LEFT JOIN jland_site.presentation p ON p.event_id = e.id LEFT JOIN jland_site.user u ON u.id = p.user_id where e.conference_id = :conference_id order by e.event_order asc;
